document_data.caption: A map of the Windrise Ports showing the Daggertooth Isle to the south.
document_data.name: Daggertooth Isle
document_data.mainbody: The '''Daggertooth Isle''' was an island off the coast of [[Laerakond]] that separated the [[Bay of Pearls]] from the open waters of the [[Great Sea]].
document_data.Description: As of [[1479 DR]], Daggertooth Isle was a den of [[pirate]]s that menaced the nearby city of [[Sambral]].
